ExampleDefinition.Title: Modify Axis Properties
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates the properties on NumericAxis and DateTimeAxis including TextFormatting, VisibleRange, AxisAlignment and the effect of changing them. Includes how to collapse gaps in a Candlestick or OHLC Chart
ExampleDefinition.Description: <Run FontSize="14" FontWeight="Bold">Modify Axis Properties</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Demonstrates the properties on NumericAxis and DateTimeAxis including TextFormatting, VisibleRange, AxisAlignment and the effect of changing them.</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontWeight="Bold" FontStyle="Italic">Interactivity Options</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - Show/Hide Major Grid Lines and Ticks.</Run> <LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - Change XAxis or YAxis Text Formatting.</Run> <LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - Swap YAxis from Right to Left alignment.</Run> <LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - Manually change XAxis or YAxis VisibleRange.</Run>
